triplets: Kitchen appliance used for baking, roasting, and heating food
Baking bread, roasting meats, reheating food, and cooking casseroles
Metal, glass, insulation materials, heating elements, and electronic components
Door, heating elements, thermostat, racks, and control panel
Typically stainless steel, black, white, or silver
Varies: compact countertop models to large built-in ovens
Appliance manufacturers like Whirlpool, Bosch, GE, etc.
